page.title: 07BORDERS F.E.COLLEGE
page.content: UNTIL RECENTLY THE BUILDING IN MELROSE ROAD WAS THE GALASHIELS FURTHER EDUCATION COLLEGE,BUT RECENT AMALGAMATION WITH HENDERSON TECHNICAL COLLEGE RESULTED IN ONE INSTITUTION CONSISTING OF THE GALASHIELS SECTION AND HENDERSON BUILDINGS IN HAWICK. COURSES ARE AVAILABLE IN VOCATIONAL AND RECREATIONAL STUDIES FOR FULL TIME AND DAY RELEASE STUDENTS WHO CAN OBTAIN QUALIFIATIONS AFTER LEAVING SCHOOL AT 16 YEARS.THERE IS NO UPPER AGE LIMIT FOR REGISTRATION. THE COLLEGE IS ALSO A LOCAL CENTRE FOR THE OPEN UNIVERSITY.TUTORIALS AND EXAMINATIONS ARE HELD FOR STUDENTS WORKING AT HOME FOR DEGREES.
